data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Puerto Plata, Dominican Republic.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Puerto Plata, Dominican Republic
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 33,894 believers in Puerto Plata, Dominican Republic a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Puerto Plata, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Father, your Word can be a lamp to the feet of the 259,395 people in the state of Puerto Plata who claim to know you, if they open it and read it today.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Japanese people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Puerto Plata, Dominican Republic.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Puerto Plata words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 33,894 believers in the state of Puerto Plata the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.
